name: LocalStack Pro DevSecOps Environment
postCreateCommand: sleep 10 && terraform -install-autocomplete && pip install awscli-local && awslocal s3 mb s3://my-local-bucket && awslocal s3api put-bucket-versioning --bucket my-local-bucket --versioning-configuration Status=Enabled && awslocal s3api put-public-access-block --bucket my-local-bucket --public-access-block-configuration 'BlockPublicAcls=true,IgnorePublicAcls=true,BlockPublicPolicy=true,RestrictPublicBuckets=true'
